projects.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics platform with machine learning insights, interactive charts, and predictive modeling. Features automated reporting and custom data visualization.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce store with Stripe integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard. Built with modern React and Express backend.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Collaborative project management tool with Kanban boards, Gantt charts, team collaboration, and time tracking features.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Beautiful weather application with 7-day forecasts, severe weather alerts, interactive radar maps, and location-based recommendations.

projects.title: Portfolio CMS
projects.description: Headless CMS for managing portfolio content, blog posts, and projects. Features markdown support, media management, and REST API.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Health and fitness app with workout logging, nutrition tracking, progress charts, and personalized workout recommendations.

projects.title: Code Snippet Manager
projects.description: Developer tool for organizing and sharing code snippets with syntax highlighting, tags, and search functionality.
